title: Ekko DC Problems
body: Every single game I play with Ekko, I constantly Dc. Only on Ekko though, when I play someone else for example Olaf, I get 50-60 ping. Is there someone who can check my Client if there is something wrong with Ekko?

replies.body: Apparently I dc everytime at the beginning of the game, ill try out your guide.
This only happens on ekko, it says attempting to reconnect even though I only have 60 ping, this happens in my rank game.

I've never heard of local files causing disconnections like the way you mention.  I suggest ruling out possibilities with your network losing comms with the game server, and to go over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  Let me know how that works out!

When you d/c, do you get any error messages?  If so, what does it say?  Does this happen in a custom game, or with any other champions?  It's really weird to be disconnected from a champion, unless you mean you're crashing.  Let me know!
